title: What is going on with my account?
body: Recently tried playing Draft Pick Normal game mode, Joined Champ select, and it went back to lobby after 5 seconds like someone dodged, but i could hear the Countdown timer to my Champion select as if it were still running, but im in lobby, the timer is stuck at 30 seconds and i can't end Que so i shut down client and restarted it with a dodge Que timer, after that i joined another lobby, i got a suspension warning saying you account will be suspended for two weeks prior to this game, but i didn't do anything wrong, anyone want to explain, i went along and changed my passwords and Emails, because i don't know if this is hacks or bugs.

replies.body: That's no good!! It sounds like your client might have bugged out for some weird reason if the lobby was happening but you never transitioned into that screen. Let's run a quick repair through the client options, and test it out in a custom or practice match. Let me know if that keeps happening or if this repair helps!
